summary: A story of a corrupt party official who attempts to sell an apartment building he has appropriated from the original owner and the struggles of the tenants to prevent themselves being thrown onto the street.
cast: Dan Zhao|Yinyan Wu|Daolin Sun|Yunzhu Shangguan|Heling Wei|Tianji Li|Zongying Huang|Pei Wang|Han Cheng|Mo Cheng|Yunzhu Ouytang|Lulu Wang|Gan Zhang|Lide Zhang
title: Wuya yu maque
